title: Learning More About God With Rabbi Harold Kushner
text:
Learning More About God With Rabbi Harold Kushner 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
It is all too easy to get swept up in the waves of cynicism that continue to flow onto our cultural shores. It feels like we mourn the death...
